title: Strengthening Language Learning Capabilities Through Failure: Failure-Based Learning Design for Intermediate Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and awareness of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Learners must experience language barriers in corporate practice and cultivate an experimental mindset unafraid of failure; enhanced collaborative activities using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can classify error types occurring in language use with 80% accuracy.
Learners improve communicative competence by revising their language errors three or more times based on peer feedback.
Learners can derive three key learning points through reflective journaling after performing role-playing based on pre-designed failure scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
